directions: In a large saucepan over medium heat, cook garlic in oil 1 minute.  Stir in tomatoes and cook 2 minutes.  Stir in garbanzo beans, water, bouillon cube, rosemary, salt and pepper.  Simmer, covered, 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
title: Chickpea and Tomato Soup
